Description

Super Bunny Laser Spikes is a vertical jumper where you control a Bunny that is leaping for it’s life! You have to dodge enemies, eat carrots in order to unlock all the awesome Power Ups and Gizmos available. The game is made with a beautiful hand-drawn art with an incredible color pallet and full of different areas to see and surpass. The enemies and sections that you have to conquer are randomly picked so that each run will look the same. The game will be available for free on iOS, Android and Windows 10.

About Imagination Overflow

Boilerplate
ImaginationOverflow is a team of people that comes together in order to make apps or games. Technically our team consists of two full time developers, but for every project we usually invite other developers, graphical and audio designers to help us make our apps and games. ImaginationOverflow started publishing apps in 2011 and games in 2016.
More information
More information on Imagination Overflow, our logo & relevant media are available here.
